front.title: Guide brief 12

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Guide Brief offers suggestions for short-term implementation tasks, as well as short-term activities, that support continual engagement during the overall planning process. Implementing short-term administrative solutions can help improve resilience and provide community benefits until longer-term solutions are implemented.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
